column6: Ultimate Spider-Man artist Stuart Immonen rejoins series regular Brian Bendis for this all-new blockbuster Avengers story.  One of the Hood's gang has found a way to power drain the New Avengers and it turns the tides of the Dark Reign in ways no one would have expected it.  Plus the new Sorcerer Supreme has a lot to learn, and they're going to learn it from...Spider-Man? Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave McCaig
